name: Preacher, Boomstick and Army of Hell
name_original: Preacher, Boomstick and Army of Hell
description:
What is Preacher, Boomstick and Army of Hell?

You are mad preacher in desperation. Revenge is all he wants. It doesn't matter if it's good or bad.
Currently, this version is for exploring and testing the environment.
Thank you for your time and support!


Controls
WASD to Move
E to Interact
Space to Dash Move
ESC to Pause

Minimum Specs
A dual-core processor.
A relatively modern GFX card.
4GB + of RAM.
